summary: WE HAVE HAD THE AWD MALFUCTION LIGHT COME ON OUR CAR FOR ABOUT 3 WINTERS.  IT ONLY HAPPENS IN THE WINTER, NEVER IN THE SUMMER. I HAVE BEEN TOLD THAT WHEN THAT LIGHT IS ON, I DO NOT HAVE AWD ACTIVATED.  I CAN SEE A LOT OF PEOPLE HAVE THIS PROBLEM.  PLEASE, I JUST WANT MY CAR TO WORK RIGHT.  *TR
